chapter.text: Tha Sin Mim Tuhan nyang teupeue meukeusud ayat Sabab Hadharat hana Neupeugah
Nyoekeuh dum ayat di dalam kitab Qur’an nyoe meuhat cit trang sileupah
Sang-sang digata gadoh seumangat Watee taingat jipeubuet salah Pakon jih batat han jimeuiman
Sabe sit meunan dum kaphe jadah Meu Kamoe kheundak Meupeutron ayat Saboh muʻjizat nyang hebat leupah Sideh di langet Meupeutron ayat Mangat jih teupat jiteukui bagah
Beurangpeue ayat teuka lom bak jih Teutap sit dijih hana jipapah Ayat nyang baro teuka bak Tuhan Han jipeureumeun jipaleng bagah
Ka jikheun sulet han jitem pateh Dudoe bak droejih teuma geupeugah Bandum geubalah teuma nyan dijih Nyang jipeu-eleh jikheun beurakah
Peue hana jieu di dalam bumoe Bak kayee sinoe hijo dum indah Kamoe peuudep dumna tanaman Meupasang-pasang galakteuh leupah
Bandum atra nyan sit jeuet keu tanda Allah Taʻala Maha Peumurah Teuma le that jih han jimeuiman Dijih bandum nyan hana phaedah
Keubit Po gata Maha Peurkasa Lom pih Po gata Maha Peumurah
Watee Neumeuhei uleh Po gata b4 Tajak hai Musa keudeh talangkah 4 Kaom nyang lalem kaphe keu Tuhan
Kaom Peuraʻeun nyang that seurakah Pakon bandum jih han jitakwa
Geukheun le Musa wahe ya Allah Lon takot sulet jipeugah keu lon Han jipateh lon jikheun beurakah
Seumpet dada lon han glah lidah lon Neukirem Harun lom Neuyue peugah
Dilon na salah pih bak awak nyan Takot jipoh lon jimeung tueng balah
Neukheun hana peue tajak bandua Ò Kamoe bri tanda nyang raya tuah Kamoe Meudeungo peue-peue nyang jikheun
Ubak Peuraʻeun keudeh tapeugah Kamoe nyoe Rasul Tuhan Po alam
Awak kamoe nyan Neuyue peuleupah Bani Israil tajok keu kamoe
Jiseuot meunoe laju jipeugah Kon gata dilee kamoe peulahra Yoh mantong gata si manyak mirah Padum thon sabe taduek ngon kamoe
Tapeubuet dudoe buet nyang that salah oi Dum guna kamoe hana tapike Tatem jak kaphe hana tapeugah
Geukheun buet lon nyan sabab meularat Watee nyan sisat lon ka roh salah
Nyankeuh jeuet lon plueng keudeh u lua Takot keu gata tameung tueng balah Teuma di sideh Tuhan bri keu lon Hikmah keu lon Neubri got leupah Neupeujeuet treuk lon keu Rasul Tuhan
Teuma nikmat nyan nyang gata peugah Tapeulahra lon yoh mantong ubit Ka tapeunamiet dum hamba Allah Bani Israil dum tapeunamiet Lalem that keubit elanya leupah
Peuraʻeun tanyong boh nyang toh Tuhan Nyang Po dum alam bunoe tapeugah
Geukheun Tuhan Po langet ngon bumoe Ngon bandum asoe bandum blah bicah Meu tatem pateh nyankeuh nyang Tuhan
Peuraʻeun jikheun bak ngon jih bagah Nyan na tadeungo roe gata bandum
Musa kheun Tuhan kuasa leupah Tuhan gata dum ngon yah-yah gata Nyang dilee masa dum ka beh leupah
Jikheun Rasul nyan nyang jak bak gata Jih nyan ka gila akai ka ubah
Geukheun Tuhan Po timu ngon barat Bandum lat batat peuneujeuet Allah Meunyo tapike ngon akai nyang got
Jikheun bek le that haba tapeugah Meu takheun tuhan laen nibak lon Gata lam palong keudeh kukeubah Dalam glap seupot kupasoe gata
Teuma kheun Musa deungo lon peugah Meunyo ek lon bri dali nyang nyata Teuma peue gata tatem meunyeurah
Jikheun jok keunoe dali bak gata Meunyo bit beuna lagee tapeugah
Geutiek treuk tungkat ka jeuet keu naga Uleue be raya nyata that leupah
Geusuet ngon jaroe puteh meukeuprak Soe nyang ngieng rusak mata jih mirah
Jikheun treuk laju bak rakan lingka Nyoe sihe raya carong jih leupah
Jimeung peuteubiet gata lam nanggroe Teuh ngon sihe nyoe gata jirajah Boh peue tapeugot teuma keu jih nyoe
Tayue preh jih nyoe teuma jipeugah Í Ngon aduen jih nyan tayue preh siat Ditanyoe rakyat jinoe dum takrah Ban saboh nanggroe meusapat keunoe
Sihe geutanyoe pih carong leupah d Sihe nyang utoh bandum tayue jak
Bandum treuk jijak keunan dum bagah Bak watee uroe nyang ka jimaklum
Jitanyong bandum ka troh talangkah
Mangat taikot bandum sihe nyan Meunyo ek meunang lagee jipeugah
‘Ohban troh keunan dum tukang sihe Ka jitanyong le jilakee upah Jilakee upah ubak Peuraʻeun Meu kamoe meunang peue na hadiah
Jikheun hadiah cit na keu gata Gata ngon raja lom toe that leupah
Geukheun le Musa boh tiek peue nyang na Nyang keunoe taba ‘oh Iheueh tarajah
Jitiek treuk taloe ngon tungkat jih dum Deumi Peuraʻeun raja nyang meugah Geutanyoe meunang meunan dum jikheun
Geutiek treuk keunan tungkat meutuah ‘Ohban ka geutiek tungkat le Musa Jiʻuet treuk sigra peue nyang meurimbah Abeh dum jiʻuet sihe awak nyan
Teukeujet yoh nyan tukang meurajah Si tukang sihe bandum jisujud Í Sabab teukeujet jikalon ulah
Jikheun treuk bandum kamoe meuiman Tuhan Po alam kuasa leupah
Tuhan Po Musa ngon Tuhan Harun

Beungeh Peuraʻeun jikheun treuk bagah Peue kameuiman laju keu jih nyan Gohlom kuizin le lon dum keu kah i Keubit gureekah jih nyang raya that Sihe dum meuhat jipeurunoe kah Nyoe beu kateupeue hukoman kubri Jaroe ngon gaki kukoh kutarah Jaroe ngon gaki kusurang sareng Lheueh nyan kupateng beu manyang leupah Bandum kuteupang u ateuh sula Nak bek biasa lawan peurintah
Seuot awak nyan hana meularat Kamoe dum meuhat meuwoe bak Allah Ubak Po kamoe keudeh dum muewoe
Neuampon kamoe meulakee bagah Raya that deecha kamoe baroekon Kamoe meuiman jinoe ya Allah Nyoekeuh dum kamoe nyang phon meuiman
Bak Musa yoh nyan Kamoe kheun bagah Bak watee malam tateubiet sigra Bandum ngon hamba Lon nyang meutuah Gata nyoe bandum jilet di likot
Keubit jiseutot Peuraʻeun jadah Bansaboh nanggroe jikrah dum rakyat
Awak nyan meuhat sit nit sileupah
Jimeung peubeungeh bandum geutanyoe
Tajaga jih nyoe beu got that leupah
Kamoe peuteubiet treuk bandum jih nyan Tinggai treuk taman jih dum nyang luah Tinggai mata ie teumpat jimanoe
Geudong meuasoe bandum jikeubah Tinggai dum pangkat jih nyang mulia
Bandum pusaka tinggai le leupah Kamoe bri bandum keu cot Israil
Dijih peureugi jiseutot bagah Ka teubiet uroe keudeh jiseutot
‘Oh ban meusapat jieu ka leumah Geukheun dum yoh nyan le rakan Musa Musoh ka teuka jehpat le leupah Tanyoe jiteumee han jipeulheueh le
Musa geukheun le bek sosah-sosah Tuhan lon sajan Neutunyok keu lon À Sit Neubri jalan tanyoe Neupeuglah
Kamoe bri wahyu teuma bak Musa Nyan tungkat gata tapoh ie bagah Tapoh ie laot ngon tungkat gata Teuhah le sigra jalan dum luah Sang gunong raya dum dalam laot Meuikot-ikot gata meung bagah
Awak nyang seutot teuma di likot Kamoe peuikot ka toe that leupah
Kamoe peuleupah Musa ngon rakan
Laen dum karam lam laot luah
Bandum atra nyan sit jeuet keu tanda Allah Taʻala kuasa leupah < Teuma le that jih han jimeuiman Dijih bandum nyan hana phaedah>
Keubit Po gata Maha Peurkasa Lom pih Po gata Maha Peumurah
Teuma tapeugah lom bak awak nyan Haba Ibrahim ureueng meutuah
Geukheun bak ayahgeuh ngon bak kaom d Geuh gata bandum peue nyan taseumah
Jikheun dum kamoe meuseumah patong Beurhala bandum han kamoe keubah
Geukheun boh na deuh jideungo gata Watee tabaca peue tameung peugah
Ek jibri le jih peue nyang munapheu“ʻat í Got pih meularat teuh ek jipeuglah
Jikheun dum kamoe meu-eu yah kamoe Bandum atra nyoe dilee geuseumah A
Geukheun taeukeuh nyang taseumah nyan
Le gata dum nyan ngon ayah-ayah Ngon yah-yah gata dum nyang ka dilee
Bandum nyan sitree lon musoh leupah 1 Meulengkan Tuhan nyang Po alam nyoe
Nyang peujeuet lon nyoe phon manyak leupah Neubri peutunyok keu lon ‘oh lheueh nyan
Neubri makanan ngon ie puleh grah
Watee saket lon Neupeupuleh le
Lon Neupeumate pih han soe teugah Neupeuudep lon lom ‘oh Iheueh mate
Neuampon sabe watee lon salah Meunapsu lon that Neuampon dacha Jan haro hara watee Neubalah Uroe kiamat haro hara that
Neubri hikmat keu lon ya Allah € Neupeusapat lon ngon ureueng shaleh
Neupeujroh leubeh nan lon gop peugah Bak ureueng dudoe nan lon beu beuna
Neubri pusaka churuga indah Churuga nikmat lon tueng pusaka Neubri keu hamba wahe ya Allah
Lom Neupeuampon dacha ayah lon Sabab ayah lon sisat ka salah
Lom pih ulon nyoe bek Neubri ‘ayeb Uroe geubangket malee lon leupah
Atra ngon aneuk hana guna le ‘Oh uroe page ka teuka sudah
Meulengkan soe-soe nyang jak bak Tuhan Ate jih iman nyang gleh sileupah
Teuma geupeutoe keunan churuga Bak ureueng takwa iman keu Allah
Diureueng sisat leumah nuraka
Geutanyong sigra ho ka tuhankah Peue nyang ka seumah nyang bukan Tuhan
Ho ka dum jih nyan kacuba peugah ž Na jitulong kah atawa droejih
Geulungkop dum jih lam apui mirah Awak nyang sisat meusapat ngon jih
Lom tentra Iblih sinan geukeubah Sipai Iblih bandum di sinan
Meudawa yoh nyan meuplah-plah babah
Deumi nyo Tuhan kamoe nyoe sisat
Gata dum meuhat kamoe jak seumah Sabab meupeusa gata ngon Tuhan Nyang Po dum alam nyang Maha Murah
Kon ureueng laen peusisat kamoe Nyoekeuh awak nyoe nyang peubuet salah
Hana chupeuʻat le soe keu kamoe
Rakan dum nyang toe pih tan le leumah
Adak meu geutem geupeuwoe kamoe Meuiman kamoe jinoe le bagah
Bandum atra nyan cit jeuet keu tanda Allah Taʻala Kuasa leupah Teuma le that jih han jimeuiman Keu jih bandum nyan hana phaedah
Keubit Po gata Maha Peurkasa Lom pih Po gata Maha Peumurah
Kaom Noh jikheun sulet dum Rasul Han jitem kaboe watee Noh peugah
Chedara jih Noh geukheun bak jih nyan Pakon gata han takwa keu Allah
Lon nyoe bit Rasul jeuet tapeucaya
Teuma takwa gata keu Allah Tataʻat keu lon nyang Rasul gata
Hana bak gata lon lakee upah Bak Po dum alam upah lon ka na
Teuma takwa gata keu Allah Tataʻat keu lon nyang Rasul gata
Jiseuot sigra peue tajak peugah Ek kamoe pateh nyan narit gata Nyang ikot gata cit awak reundah Rakan gata dum cit hina dina
Geukheun boh hana nyang jeuet lon peugah Hana lon teupeue dum buet ureueng nyan
Keunira gopnyan sideh bak Allah Meunyo tateupeue Po lon nyang kira
Ureueng nyan teuma han jeuet lon keubah Han roe lon use ureueng meuiman
Peuingat mantong dilon lon peugah Lon nyoe peuingat sagai nyang nyata
Jikheun treuk boh ka bek le tapeugah Meunyo han taiem hai Noh digata Meurajam gata jinoe le bagah
Kheun Noh Tuhanku pakri kaom lon Han jipateh lon jikheun beurakah
Neubuka jalan keu lon nibak jih Neubri lon bak jih jinoe le beu glah Ngon dum rakan lon ureueng meuiman
Teuma Noh lheueh nyan Kamoe peuleupah Ngon rakan gopnyan geu-ek lam kapai Nyang peunoh beukai dum ngon blah bicah
Awak nyang tinggai laen nibak nyan Kamoe peukaram lam laot luah
Atra nyan bandum sit jeuet keu tanda Allah Taʻala Kuasa leupah Teuma le that jih han jimeuiman Dijih bandum nyan hana phaedah
Keubit Po gata Maha Peurkasa Lom pih Po gata Maha Peumurah
Jikheun lom le ‘Ad sulet dum Rasul Han jitem kaboi peue nyang Hud peugah
Chedara jih Hud geukheun bak jih nyan Pakon gata han takwa keu Allah
Lon nyoe bit Rasul jeuet tapeucaya
Teuma takwa gata keu Allah Tataʻat keu lon nyang Rasul gata
Hana bak gata lon lakee upah Bak Po dum alam upah lon ka na
Pakon tabina geudong dum meugah Pat-pat tanoh cot tapeudong geudong Teumpat tameuʻen meumewah-mewah
Tapeugot kota dum ban saboh nyan Takira dum nyan han le takeubah f Tapike keukaiteuh sinan sabe Sang han le mateteuh meunan ulah
‘Oh tapeuleumah droeteuh kuasa Angkara murka lalem sileupah Leupah that keujam buetteuh di gata
Teuma takwa jinoe keu Allah Tataʻat keu lon nyang Rasul gata
Nikmat keu gata Neubri le leupah d Tateupeue nikmat le that keu gata Nyankeuh tatakwa mantong keu Allah
Padum na Neubri binatang teurnak Neubri ngon aneukteuh le sileupah
Padum na keubon ngon ie mon mata
Teuma keu gata lon takot salah Lon takot azeueb Neubri keu gata Bak uroe gata teurimong balah Uroe kiamat haro hara that
Jiseuot leugat peue roe tapeugah Tabri nasehat keunoe keu kamoe À Saban bak kamoe ngon han tapeugah Saban ngon hana tabri nasehat
Buet nyoe cit adat masa nyang sudah Ureueng dileekon pih buetgeuh meunoe
Teuma keu kamoe han roe geubalah Hana geuazeueb bandum na kamoe

Meu gata sidroe nyang sulet leupah Keu Rasul Kamoe jikheun doseuta Meupeubinasa treuk jih dum bagah Atra nyan bandum pih jeuet keu tanda Allah Taʻala Kuasa leupah Teuma le that jih han jimeuiman Keu jih bandum nyan hana phaedah
Keubit Po gata Maha Peurkasa Lom pih Po gata Maha Peumurah
Tsamud pih jikheun sulet dum Rasul Han jitem kaboi peue Shaleh peugah
Geukheun le Shaleh chedara jih nyan Pakon gata han takwa keu Allah
Lon nyoe bit Rasul jeuet tapeucaya
Teuma takwa gata keu Allah Tataʻat keu lon nyang Rasul gata
Hana bak gata lon lakee upah Upah lon ka na bak Po dum alam
Ek gata aman sinoe geukeubah Peue han meuminah gata dum sinoe Dalam nanggroe nyoe amanteuh leupah
Lam keubon-keubon ngon ie mon mata
Lom nyang tapula tanaman indah Mayam keureuma meuayon-ayon Ngon leumiek leumbon galakteuh leupah
Tapeugot rumoh tapheuet dum gunong Tapeubuet ceumong ngon reuoh reuah Hekteuh ngon payah hana takira
Teuma takwa jinoe keu Allah Tataʻat keu lon nyang Rasul gata
Bek le digata tapeubuet salah Awak nyang lalem bek le taikot
Jipeubuet karot di bumoe Allah Jipeubuet fased kon jipeubuet got
Jiseuot leugat peue roe tapeugah Ka jipeusihe gata dih lagoe
Gata ngon kamoe saban that leupah Gata ngon kamoe sit manusia Boh teh keu tanda peuleumah bagah Meu nyo bit gata ureueng nyang beuna
Nyoe saboh unta Shaleh kheun bagah Dijih na watee jijeb ie keudroe Digata keudroe tajeb puleh grah Uroe ie gata bagi bandua
Teuma bek gata tapeubuet salah Bek taelanya teuma unta nyan Keu gata Tuhan teuma Neubalah Uroe kiamat uroe that raya Neuʻazeueb gata teuma le Allah
Jitop ngon leumbeng teuma unta nyan Dijih ‘oh lheueh nyan meunyeusai teulah

Teuma geuʻazeueb treuk dum awak nyan Sabab buet jih nyan raya that salah Bandum atra nyan pih jeuet keu tanda Allah Taʻala Kuasa leupah Teuma le that jih han jimeuiman Kon na atra nyan jitueng phaedah
Keubit Po gata Maha Peurkasa Lom pih Po gata Maha Peumurah
Kaom Luth jikheun sulet cit Rasul Han jitem kaboi peue nyang geupeugah
Chedara jih Luth geukheun bak jih nyan Pakon gata han takwa keu Allah
Lon nyoe bit Rasul jeuet tapeucaya
Teuma takwa gata keu Allah Tataʻat keu lon nyang Rasul gata
Hana bak gata lon lakee upah Bak Po dum alam upah lon ka na
Pakon dum gata tapeubuet salah Tamita agam dum manusia Nyang aneuk dara bandum takeubah
Takeubah inong peurumoh gata Nyang ka keu gata Neubri le Allah Jeuet gata teuma kaom elanya
Jiseuot sigra peue roe tapeugah Hai Luth digata meu han tapiyoh Keudeh meuparoh dalam blang luah Meunyo han taiem meuuse gata
Geukheun treuk sigra dilon ka sudah Buet gata dum nyan dilon that beunci
Tuhanku Neubri lon nyoe beu leupah Lon ngon ahli lon bek roh bak buet jih Keubit dum buet jih raya that salah
Kamoe peuleupah treuk teuma gopnyan Ngon ahli gopnyan laju Meupeuglah
Meulengkan inong peurumoh gopnyan Roh lam kawan nyan awak nyang salah
Nyang laen bandum Meupeubinasa
Ujeuen kreueh raya keu jih Meuruah Ngon ujeuen batee Kamoe geulawa Sabab keu jih ka geuba peurintah Sijeuheut ujeuen keu jih jirasa Jikheun dusta keu Rasul Allah
Atra nyan bandum pih jeuet keu tanda Allah Taʻala Kuasa leupah Teuma le that jih han jimeuiman Hana atra nyan jitueng phaedah
Keubit Po gata Maha Peurkasa Lom pih Po gata Maha Peumurah
Kaom Aikah pih peusulet Rasul Han jitem kaboi peue nyang geupeugah
Geukheun le Syuʻib ubak awak nyan Pakon gata han takwa keu Allah
Lon nyoe bit Rasul jeuet tapeucaya
Teuma takwa gata keu Allah Tataʻat keu lon nyang Rasul gata
Hana bak gata lon lakee upah Upah lon ka na bak Po dum alam
Teuma sukatan bek tapeusalah Beu santeut are ‘oh tabloe peubloe Bek tapeurugoe dum hamba Allah
Ngon ceng nyang beutoi watee tatimang Bek miyup manyang on ceng dua blah
Barang-barang gop bek tapeukureueng Buet nyan that hareuem beu tapeusiblah Bek peubuet jeuheut di dalam bumoe
Takwa jinoe laju keu Allah Tuhan nyang peujeuet gata nyoe bandum Angkatan jameun pih hana ubah Ureueng nyang dilee pih Tuhan peujeuet
Jiseuot leugat peue roe tapeugah Ka jipeusihe gata uroe nyoe
Gata ngon kamoe kon saban leupah Gata ngon kamoe sit manusia Meukira gata sang sulet leupah
Peurhot bak kamoe geureupeng langet Meu beuna keubit peue nyang tapeugah
Geukheun Tuhan lon bandum Neuteupeue Buetteuh beurangpeue Neuteupeue sudah
Jikheun treuk sulet Syuʻib Rasul jih Geuazeueb treuk jih nyang brat sileupah Uroe meuawan uroe kiamat Haro hara that hana ban peugah
Atra nyan bandum pih jeuet keu tanda € Allah Taʻala kuasa leupah Teuma le that jih han jimeuiman Hana atra nyan jitueng phaedah
Keubit Po gata Maha Peurkasa Lom pih Po gata Maha Peumurah
Keubit Qur'an Tuhan nyang peutron Nyang Po dum alam deungon blah bicah
Ruhul-Amin ba peutron bak gata
Lam ate gata geupasoe bagah Mangat jeuet gata ureueng peuingat
Ngon bahsa Arab nyang trang sileupah
Atra nyan dilee sit na lam kitab Ureueng awai that geuteupeue sudah
Peue teuma keu jih han jeuet keu tanda Bandum ulama jih ka jipeugah c Bandum ulama Bani Israi Jiteupeue sare bandum nyan sudah
Meunyo Meupeutron teuma Qur'an Bak ureueng ‘ajam ladom Meupeugah
Teuma geubaca atra nyan keu jih Han sit jipateh peue nyang geupeugah Beurangban dijih han jimeuiman
Cit kakeuh meunan ate jih salah Di dalam ate awak meudacha Kamoe peuteuka bit meunan ulah
Meu goh lom jieu azeueb nyang peudeh Han sagai dijih iman keu Allah
Ban tanjo teuka treuk azeueb bak jih ‘Oh jithee dijih teukeujet leupah Hana jithee-thee nyan teuka bak jih
Watee nyan dijih baro jipeugah Peue hana tanggoh watee keu kamoe
Peue cit bak Kamoe jilakee bagah Jilakee azeueb bagah Kamoe bri
Nyang ka Kamoe bri seunang jih leupah Meubri meuthon-thon seunang jih raya
Lheueh nyan meuteuka treuk keu jih balah Peue nyang geujanji laju ka teuka
Hana le guna udep nyang mewah Seunang baroekon hana guna le Sapeue tan hase keu jih phaedah
Di-Kamoe sit han Meupeubinasa Nanggroe ngon banda meu hana salah Ureueng peuingat Meukirem dilee
Jiingat teuntee jitueng phaedah Han meuelanya sagai di-Kamoe
Qur'an nyang nyoe teuma kon salah Kon Qur’an nyoe tron nibak cheitan
Hana sipadan meu ube seupah Han sagai patot jih nyan nyang peutron Han ek jipeutron leumoh jih leupah
Jak deungo-deungo hana le bak jih Hana le keu jih Neubri le Allah
Teuma bek tacok tuhan nyang laen Takheun na laen sajan ngon Allah Bek teuma dudoe geuazeueb gata
Bak ahli gata bandum tapeugah Famili nyang toe beu tapeuingat Saket ngon mangat bek dudoe teulah
Ureueng meuiman nyang ikot gata Mameh suara beu got tapeugah Tapeumiyup droeteuh ngon ureueng nyan
Teuma awak nyan nyang peubuet salah Nyang han tem pateh peue narit gata Takheun dilon ka lheueh lon peurintah Peue nyang tapeubuet kon le salah lon Karena dilon ka lheueh lon peugah
Teuma tajok droe bak Hak Taʻala Nyang that peurkasa lom that Peumurah
Tuhan Neukalon bak watee tadong Peubuet seumbahyang taseumah Allah
Hana tapiyoh taruku‘ sujud Peue nyang tapeubuet Neu-eu le Allah
Keubit roe Tuhan Neudeungo dumpeue Neuteupeue dumpeue hana meuilah
Lon peugah teuma jinoe bak gata Ho jijak teuka cheitan seurakah Bak soe jijak jih jikheun jimeung tron
Keudeh jijak tren bak awak salah Awak nyang sulet nyang peuna-peuna Nyang peubuet dacha lawan peurintah
Peue nyang jideungo jipeugah laju Narit palsu sulet that leupah Le that awak nyan nyang keubit sulet Dijih peunyaket leupah that parah
Teuma ureueng nyang meupanton-panton Meualon-alon haba jipeugah Nyang ikot jih nyan dum awak sisat
Takalon meuhat ho dum jilangkah Dalam urong gle jimeutualang
Jipubuet dum tan peue nyang jipeugah

Meulengkan ureueng nyang na meuiman Teuma ureueng nyan hana meusalah Amai nyang got-got geupeubuet sabe Geukheun ngon ziker geuingat Allah Le that jan watee geuingat Tuhan Ureueng nyan meunang Neubri le Allah Dileekon gopnyan dum jielanya ‘Oh meunang teuma seunang that leupah Awak nyang lalem akan jiteupeue Ho teuma jiwoe ho jimeung langkah AN-NAML (SIDOM) Ngon nama Allah lon peuphon surat Tuhan Hadharat nyang Maha Murah Tuhanku Sidroe geumaseh that-that Donya akhirat rahmat Neulimpah
